skillTree.localised_description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!
All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: From the most gigantic of flyers down to the diminutive spiderlings, a Swarmcaller always has them moving in the right direction.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Clan Verms Vermin units
	(Hero's army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Clan Verms Vermin units
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Verminkeepers can not only marshal the swarm, but help it to grow and progress.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Clan Verms Vermin units
	(Hero's army)

Casualty replenishment rate: +5% for Clan Verms Vermin units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Show a Packmaster a hero and he will show you a tragedy.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Hero action cost: -10% for all actions
Wound action: Additional 20% chance of wounding target
Hero action cost: -20% for all actions

skillTree.localised_description: Catching lesser foes is hardly a challenge, but is undeniably useful to provide extra rations for the pack.

effects.description:
Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -5%
	(enemy armies in local province)
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 10%

Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -10%
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Whether by attachment or mutation, something nasty and spiky on your tail has got to bring no little advantage in battle.
This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Even the most vicious and impetuous monstrosities can be 'encouraged' to do one’s bidding with a quick jolt of Warpstone-generated electricity.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Green bolts of purest poison burst forth from the Swarmcaller and streak towards the enemy.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Scorpion's Poison"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Scorpion's Poison Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Scorpion's Poison Upgraded"

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: As the Lore of Vermin siphons the Winds of Magic, an buzzy nuisance surrounds the surface dwellers… vermin lurk in the shadows.
Behold the Vermintide; the Wizard calls and the spiders will answer!

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Spider Hatchlings
Summons a unit of Spider Hatchlings

skillTree.localised_description: Spurred by the magics of Clan Verms, the vermin that they hold so dear manifest on their foes, biting at their flesh

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Infestation of Vermin"

skillTree.localised_description: The swarm obliterates all in its path.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Verminous Swarm"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Verminous Swarm Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Verminous Swarm Upgraded"

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.localised_description: Dragged from its lair in the depths of the Under-Empire comes a giant shrieking bat, willing to take its fury out on any who stand in its path.

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -5 for "Call of the Shrieker"

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only

skillTree.localised_description: The Wizard casts an arcane net, created to hold the enemies of Clan Verms and spun from the most magical of all spider silks. Any caught in its strands will struggle to act.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Entwining Net"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Entwining Net Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Entwining Net Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "I keep them sharp, yes-yes. Always ready for the challenge that I know is coming, yes-yes!"
"When they come for you, go straight for the throat and tear it clean out. They won't come again."
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
